C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After leaving Avalon, you find yourself in a strange space where you must find your own path forward.

C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_DETAIL.text: Something has been released inside you.

C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_DETAIL.text: Something is gradually being released deep inside you. Could it be your heart?

C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_DETAIL.text: You hope everything that's been released inside you is proving useful, but it's impossible to calculate the answer. Is this what humans call 'unease'?

C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_DETAIL.text: Imakoo kept your body safe and sound. You cannot thank him enough.

C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: Apparently it's been a while since you were last in the Junction?

C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_TITLE.text: On the Other Side of the Door

C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You still can't be sure if you gained anything from your experiences on the other side of the door.

C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_DETAIL.text: As a mech, you have no lingering regrets to speak of. Not much else to do but give it your all.

C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_DETAIL.text: All of your functions have been unlocked, but Constantine is nowhere to be found.

C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: As no one else can see the results of your scans, you must decide which door to open.

C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_DETAIL.text: What could his true goal be? Even with your memories restored, you can't work out the answer to that question.

C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: You were told to go wherever you like, but have no idea where that is.

C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: You lost the power of song, yet yearn to sing again. Will that ever be possible?

C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: You finally have your power back—and it's time to use it for the good of everyone!

C01_DOOR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: If you want to learn the answers to everything that has transpired, you need to go after him.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: Constantine has been using everyone this whole time—and you won't stand for it.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W01_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one is protected by a force field.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W02_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, the power of spirits flows into this one.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W03_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, negative energy is flowing into this one.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W04_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place that is over 95 percent water.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W06_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place where life-forms are distributed in a very odd way.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W07_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place with five unbalanced powers.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W08_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W08_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place deep beneath the earth.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W10_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W10_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one can be opened and closed from the other side.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W11_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W11_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place where the volatility of its plant habitat is outside acceptable limits.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W12_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W12_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place where overall activity levels have fallen to less than ten percent.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W13_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W13_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place that is 95 percent sand.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W14_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W14_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one is releasing scanning particles to all of the others.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W15_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W15_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place that is 95 percent affiliated with triangles.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W17_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W17_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place where 80 percent of the land is at war.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W18_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W18_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place where two warring factions are locked in a stalemate.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_W19_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_W19_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, this one leads to a place that retains less than five percent of the technology it once boasted has survived.

C01_DOOR_DIVA_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_DIVA_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.text: A truly grueling battle awaits beyond this door.
